title: Song Registration Portal - Department of Cultural Affairs
shortDescription: A government song registration portal and CMS linking Joomla! with a Laravel + React portal, built for Procons Infectic.
longDescription: Delivered for Procons Infectic as a government contract with the Department of Cultural Affairs. The solution consists of a public portal (Laravel + React) where users can register songs, search, and view submissions, and a full-featured Joomla! CMS for content and administrative workflows. Implemented secure REST APIs to synchronize data between Laravel and Joomla!, enabling Joomla! components to render portal data and the portal to consume CMS-managed content. Features include user registration and authentication, song metadata management, admin approval and moderation workflows, search and filtering, audit logging, and responsive UI built with Bootstrap. Deployed on AWS with a MySQL backend and production-hardened security and validation.

title: NiLET (National Institute of Language Education and Training)
shortDescription: Integrated WordPress CMS with a custom Laravel + Bootstrap + Vue.js student portal for managing language course registrations and administration.
longDescription: Built for Procons Infotech as a government contract, NiLET combines a public WordPress CMS with a fully custom Laravel portal to manage language education services. The portal handles student registration for multiple language courses, fees management, recordings and WhatsApp group integrations (including automated group creation and link handling), complaint management, certificate printing and stock control, and payment change requests with slip uploads for penalty charges. It includes coordinator workflows, role-based permissions, results publishing via CSV upload with publish/unpublish/hold controls, batch-based course enrollment limits, and administrative tools for coordinators and lecturers. Secure REST APIs synchronize data between WordPress and the portal. Deployed on AWS for scalability and reliability.

title: Procons Academy
shortDescription: Enterprise-grade academy platform integrating ASP.NET Core, React + Redux frontend, Tailwind CSS, WordPress CMS, Laravel admin, and Moodle for student LMS.
longDescription: Procons Academy is a full-featured enterprise learning platform built for the Procons group. The public client-facing UI uses a premium WordPress theme for CMS-driven content and marketing pages, while the core application combines an ASP.NET Core backend with a React + Redux frontend styled with Tailwind CSS (ESS). Lecturers and coordinators manage courses and lectures in a Laravel-based admin panel; those actions are automatically synchronized to Moodle via Moodle web services and custom Moodle APIs, ensuring duplicate course creation and consistent student enrollments. Students access coursework and learning activities in Moodle (student portal). The system supports online and offline payments with automated reconciliation, Zoom integration for scheduling and automatic capture of meeting links/emails, automated email notifications, certificate generation, role-based permissions (course coordinators, lecturers, admins, students), audit logging, and background job processing for long-running tasks. Deployed on AWS with load balancing, auto-scaling, Dockerized services, secure networking, monitoring and backup strategies to ensure high availability and enterprise-grade performance.

title: ERDly
shortDescription: Lightweight visual ERD builder with AI assistant to draft schemas and export SQL.
longDescription: ERDly is a lightweight visual ERD (Entity Relationship Diagram) builder built with React + TypeScript, Vite and shadcn-ui. Design schemas visually on a drag-and-drop canvas (React Flow), add fields (PK, UNIQUE, NULL flags), and create relationships (1:1, 1:N, N:M) with automatic junction-table creation. Use the Gemini-powered AI assistant to auto-draft schemas from a business idea and export production-ready SQL.

title: APIIT University Blog
shortDescription: A comprehensive student blog platform built for APIIT University to foster engagement and collaboration
longDescription: Developed an enterprise-level platform for APIIT University featuring personalized experiences based on student affiliations, multi-admin role panels, interactive blog system, event calendar with real-time notifications, appointment booking system, alumni hub for networking, and advanced search functionality. Implemented robust security through middlewares, gates, and policies with email verification and role-based access. Enhanced with SEO optimization to ensure platform discoverability and accessibility.

title: Ceylon Sports Club Canada
shortDescription: Enterprise-level web solution for a not-for-profit social club connecting Sri Lankan cricket enthusiasts in Canada
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive platform for Ceylon Sports Club featuring sports & team management, membership systems, event booking with calendar integration, document management with version control, and a blog for club updates. Implemented robust security through middlewares, gates, and policies, with background jobs and queues for efficient email notifications and form processing. The platform serves the growing Sri Lankan cricket community in Canada with SEO optimizations for enhanced visibility.

title: Next-Gen Project Mgmt Tool
shortDescription: Advanced project management platform with Gemini AI integration for intelligent task automation and insights
longDescription: Engineered a cutting-edge project management solution that leverages Gemini AI to provide intelligent workflow suggestions, automate routine tasks, and deliver data-driven insights. The platform features real-time collaboration, customizable dashboards, resource allocation optimization, and predictive analytics for project timelines. Built with a robust ASP.NET backend and responsive React frontend with Redux state management for optimal performance and scalability.

title: JustListenIt Chrome Extension
shortDescription: A Chrome extension that reads selected text on any web page out loud for improved accessibility and productivity
longDescription: Developed JustListenIt, a lightweight yet powerful Chrome extension that allows users to select any text on a webpage and have it read aloud instantly. Built using JavaScript, Chrome Extension APIs, and the Web Speech API for natural-sounding speech synthesis. Includes features like language detection, customizable voices, and playback speed adjustment. Ideal for users with accessibility needs or those who prefer auditory content consumption.

title: SQL Script Shaper
shortDescription: A modern web application that converts CSV and Excel files into ready-to-use SQL INSERT statements with customizable options
longDescription: Developed a streamlined web tool that transforms spreadsheet data into SQL database scripts instantly. The application features drag-and-drop file upload supporting both CSV and Excel formats, real-time data preview with validation, and live table editing capabilities where users can modify cell data directly in the UI. Changes are reflected immediately in the generated SQL code, providing instant feedback. Includes customizable SQL generation options such as table naming, DROP TABLE statements, and string wrapping preferences. Built with a modern React interface using ShadCN UI components, particle background animations, and toast notifications for enhanced user experience. Features intelligent data type detection, automatic table name generation from filenames, and comprehensive error handling for robust file processing.

title: APILite
shortDescription: A sleek and powerful Postman-lite API request builder with modern UI and enhanced request/response workflows.
longDescription: Designed and built a lightweight yet feature-rich API testing tool that streamlines the process of crafting, sending, and inspecting HTTP requests. APILite features method toggles, header and query param editors, raw/form/x-www support, and a dynamic response viewer with syntax highlighting. Requests can be saved, organized, and re-executed via a built-in history manager. The application focuses heavily on user experience with dark-mode UI, intuitive animations, local storage persistence, and real-time validation feedback. Ideal for developers looking for a fast, clean, browser-based alternative to Postman.

title: AI Resume Matcher
shortDescription: A smart resume analysis tool that ranks CVs based on job descriptions using Gemini AI with built-in ZIP parsing and real-time scoring.
longDescription: AI Resume Matcher is an intelligent frontend-only tool that allows users to upload a ZIP file of CVs (PDF/DOCX/TXT) and input a job description. The application parses the resumes, compares them to the job requirements using Gemini API, and generates a match score with reasoning for each candidate. It features light/dark theme toggle, file validation, Supabase authentication, usage limits for free users, and a beautiful UI built with ShadCN components. Designed for quick assessments and ranking of candidates without a backend, this tool is ideal for HR professionals, recruiters, and startups.
